name: Tournament: Sky Strife
description:
Come join the first ever 32-player, in-person tournament of Sky Strife, a fully onchain blend of an RTS and turn-based strategy game. Inspired by games like Starcraft, players compete to amass the largest army, destroy their opponents' bases, and ultimately, be the last one standing in free-for-all matches.

Sandwiches and soft drinks will be provided for all attendantsâ€”spectators and competitors alike.

speakers.name: Lattice
speakers.bio: Lattice is an engineering and product focused company pushing the envelope of Ethereum applications and infrastructure.
